entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
